About

I am a experimental Immunologist by training. I use non-human primates model to study inflammation in diseases condition or during aging. My precious work focus on neutrophils:

But,… (since you haven’t closed the windows by now) I am also in love with data. Like my boss always says: ‘Data will tell.’
